SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = "" : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
: IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#, &OUTPUT_LOG#) : PROCESS &HND# : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#,&LINE#) : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#,&NL#) : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ENDIF
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#,,WORKFLOW
